FuncDef: The display dns dynamic-host command displays information about dynamic DNS entries in the domain name cache.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VPN to be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: No  Domain Name         IpAddress      TTL    Alias
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring dynamic DNS, you can run the display dns dynamic-host command to view information about dynamic DNS entries stored in the domain name cache.
